text:
New Jersey - REMOTE from within U.S. (most of team is remote)
Heavy AngularJS, Node.js, SQL Server
Healthcare IT position, Contract to full-time if desired
Help build front-end components for an established and very successful Health IT company. We are in over 250 hospitals in the U.S. Our developers are experts in Javascript and very self-motivated.
Must have E&O insurance (we're talking HIPAA rules level of confidentiality here)
Send me your info: lee@medactionplan.com
